about_the_game:
The Maximum Football: Starter Pack includes cosmetic items, Maximum Pro League Card packs, Max tickets, and enough Hard Currency for the Season Pass.

1. Castonguay Stadium

2. “Propose” Celebration

3. Card Pack - Epic x10

4. Card Pack - Positional QBx1

5. Card Pack - Positional RBx1

6. Card Pack - Positional WRx1

7. Card Pack - Positional LBx1

8. Card Pack - Positional Secondaryx1

9. Tickets x10

10. 1000 Max Stacks (Hard Currency)

This content requires the base game Maximum Football on Steam in order to play.

short_description: Lead your team to victory in Maximum Football, the fully customizable, free-to-play football simulation game. Build and design your team your way, recruit your roster, and call the plays to dominate the gridiron with precise, realistic gameplay in the ultimate football universe.
